column5: Looked through the regs and didn't see anything on limits.
No limit, open all year.  S.
I'll check but as far as I know, there are no limits on ling. I'll get back to you.
The regs make no mention of ling limits. Geeez am I ever slow.

If I'm not mistaken they fall into the "coarse" fish category, read more grasshopper and your questions will be answered. But, by then you'll probably have forgotten what you were wondering about.  From the regs:Coarse fish include: gar family, bowfin, catfish family, burbot, eel and freshwater drum or sheepshead.  Burbot a.k.a. Ling
Aren't eels an endangered species now or a species of concern and have a protected status?
